document.docTitle: Woodbury Clay Co. Papers: outbound carload report no. 6, 1931-08-12
document.headnote: Report of outbound carloads of fire clay from Woodbury Clay Co., Oreminea, PA. The Woodbury Clay Co. papers consist of various waybills and carload reports recovered from bulk papers dumped at Antique Depot flea market, Duncansville PA, spring 2018. Collection of C. R. Chinoy.

docText.header:
C.T. 1098 B
109M 12x3¾-W 2-16-31 THE PENNSYLVANIA RAILROAD Daily Report of Carloads Weighed and Forwarded MIDDLE [Division] JUNKATA S C LES [Juniata Scales] 8 12 31 19 Shipper WOODBURY CLAY CO Mine OREMINEA PA Siding No.
docText.note:
Date:_______________________192__.
Received by the Pennsylvania Railroad
Company subject to rate in effect on
date of receipt of shipment.
_________________H. C. Yon,_________________
Agent, Altoona Juniata Scales___________

carloadTable.carload: P 75394 B 100 CLAY 1304 420 884 X BETHLEHEM STEEL CO SPARROWS PT MD
537736 1581 441 1140 X HARBINSON WALKER REF CO WOODLAND PA

docText.footer:
This Report should be made up in accordance with instructions given in Rule 26 C.T. 1000
In the column headed "Car Loaded Full" place this mark X when the car is loaded full, and the word NOT when the car is not loaded full.
In the column headed "Kind" use the following letters to designate kind of Car: B—Box A—Automobile BF—Furniture DD—Double Deck Stock
SD—Single Deck Stock G—Gondola H—Hopper Gondola CK—Coke.
In the column headed "Lading" use the following letters to designate kind of Lading: A—Anthracite Coal B—Bituminous Coal K—Coke.
H C Yon MCD
